title: [Large-Scale] Continuous Professional Development (CPD) Course for Pre-Service Foreign Language Teachers Through 3D Virtual Environment-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational foreign language education theory and basic teaching skills
context.additional_context: Professional development program for in-service secondary foreign language teachers, supporting expertise development through collaborative learning experiences using the Jigsaw method in 3D virtual environments. Requires designing activities implementable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement collaborative learning scenarios using the Jigsaw method in 3D virtual environments at least three times.
Learners improve foreign language lesson design capabilities by over 20% through real-time interactions with peer teachers.
Learners can create and execute a Continuing Professional Development (CPD) plan based on collaborative learning experiences in virtual environments.

resources: Sloodle Plugin-Supported 3D Virtual Environment (Open Sim Compatible)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
